Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Inene abo bangakholwayo kuya kuthethwa kuthiwe kubo: “Inkcaso ka-Allâh kuni yayingaphezulu kunokuchasana kwenu ukanti nanimenyiwe kodwa nina anakholwa.’’
Baya kuthi: “Nkosi yethu, Wasenza asabi nabomi kabini, Wasinika ubomi kabini, yaye siyazivuma izono zethu, ingaba ikhona na indlela yokuphuma?’’

(Kuya kuthiwa kubo): “Oku kungenxa yokuba ngelixa uAllâh Wayethandazwa, (Enqulwa) Yedwa nina naye anakholwa, Kodwa kwathi kusakwayanyaniswa abanye kuYe nakholwa. (Ngoku) ke uMgwebo ngoka-Allâh Ophakamileyo, Omkhulu.’’
NguYe Onibonisa imiqondiso yaKhe, Athumele kuni imbonelelo ivela esibhakabhakeni. Kodwa akukho namnye oya kukhumbula ngaphandle kwalowo ubuyelayo (aguquke)
(Yena uAllâh) nguSobunganga, Ongentla kwayo (yonke) imimiselo, Umnini weTrone; Uphefumlela umyalelo waKhe kulowo Athandileyo kwizicaka zaKhe, ukuba alumkise ngeMini yendibano
Mhla baziswa ngaphambili akukho nto emayela nabo iya kufihlakala kuAllâh. Lelikabani na lonke igunya naMhlanje? Lelika-Allâh, Omnye Ongaphikiswayo
NaMhla umphefumlo ngamnye uya kuvuzwa ngoko wakusebenzelayo. Akuyi kubakho ntswela-bulungisa namhlanje! IneneuAllâh, Uyakhawulezaukufakaembuzweni
Balumkise (Muhammad), ngeMini esondelayo, xa iintliziyo ziya kuba semqaleni, (zixhalabile). Ke kaloku kubenzi bobubi akuyi kubakho mhlobo usenyongweni kungayi kubakho mthetheleli uya kuthotyelwa
(UAllâh) Uyakwazi okukholisa amehlo (abo) noko kufihlwa zizifuba (zabo)
Kananjalo uAllâh Ugweba ngenyaniso, lo gama abo bathandaza kubo ngaphandle kwaKhe bengagwebi nganto. Inene uAllâh nguSokuva, uSokubona
